review_title: A decent shirt, but what a smell.
reviews:
It's just a t-shirt, and the quality so far seems ok. But it has been treated with some kind of Febreeze-type of smelly stuff. Maybe some people like that smell, but I can't abide it. So the shirts have gone straight into the wash before I've tried them on. I sure hope that stink washes out.
Ok, the next day. I unwisely washed the smelly t-shirts with a few other clothes. Those clothes and the laundry room soon had that horrible, chemical smell of Febreeze. I ran the lot through the washer four times, with extra rinse cycle selected. Reduced the smell, but did not eliminate. Everything now hanging on the clothesline in the sun and wind which hopefully will reduce the stench further.
product_name: Gildan Mens Ultra Cotton Adult T-Shirt with Pocket, 2-Pack Shirt

reviews: I didn’t want pockets, then I got pockets. One might Call them bonus pockets, but I really am a less is more guy when it comes to pockets. What’s the difference between cargos and every other pair of adult pants? Pockets. Oh, and I am. Rotund, 5 ft 11 man and the neck and length on a xxl is a little on the spacious side, maybe because I need to be more muscular or less fat and fit an xxl. Maybe a little from column a and a little from column b?
product_name: Gildan Mens Ultra Cotton Adult T-Shirt with Pocket, 2-Pack Shirt

reviews: Gave these as a gift to my dad as it's hard to find t shirts with pockets in store. They are not pre shrunk, he washed them in warm water and they shrunk to a mini size. Very disappointed.
product_name: Gildan Mens Ultra Cotton Adult T-Shirt with Pocket, 2-Pack Shirt

reviews: Great, industry standard Gildan heavyweight cotton T-shirts. The good ones... at a reasonable price. Thank you!
product_name: Gildan Mens Ultra Cotton Adult T-Shirt with Pocket, 2-Pack Shirt

reviews: The original fit was great and its colour too, but I have machine washed it twice now (cold water) and tumble dry on low and it is now smaller, less breathable too, and it is more faded than some items I’ve owned for years. The construction of it is okay, but the fabric (and dye quality) is too cheap. I won’t buy again.
